page.title: 13CHICHESTER-A THEATRE DAY
page.content: {June13th'85}begins with the opening of the box office at 10am with a queue of people for unreserved seats.{John Gale ,the director, and other theatre staff are preparing for today's performances & the other 3 plays which are{Antony & {Cleopatra,The Scarlet Pimpernel & The {Philanthropist.}Today's 2 performances are {Cavalcade }by {Noel Coward} with {Joanna McCallum}and{Lewis Fiander.}The cast start arriving about 11.30am. The coffee bar and restaurant are busy at lunchtime as the audience begins to arrive. The matinee begins and the audience enjoys the performance which has a large cast of Cavalcaders who are local amateurs. After the matinee preparations are made for the evening performance.As they leave the audience look forward to seeing the later plays with{Diana Rigg, Denis Quilley, Edward {Fox}and{Donald Sinden.
